entry.title: The Secure Hangfire Dashboard: Fortifying Your ASP.NET Core 8 with an Authorization Filter
entry.summary:
In the world of technology, securing your Hangfire Dashboard in ASP.NET Core 8 has become a top priority. A new article has been published, highlighting the importance of adding an Authorization Filter to ensure the safety of your dashboard. This filter helps in restricting access to authorized users only, preventing any unauthorized access or potential security breaches. It is a significant step towards enhancing the security measures of Hangfire Dashboard.

In other news, LinkedIn, the popular professional networking platform, has shared insights into how they utilize Kafka, Samza, and RocksDB to smartly route notifications. These technologies play a crucial role in efficiently delivering notifications to millions of LinkedIn users. Kafka acts as a distributed streaming platform, Samza helps in processing and analyzing real-time data streams, and RocksDB is used as a persistent key-value store. By leveraging these tools, LinkedIn ensures that notifications are delivered promptly and accurately, enhancing the overall user experience.
